website_summaries.verdict: This mammoth kids' train table is large enough for siblings to enjoy together peacefully and offers endless ways to play, exciting dips, and a vast number of accessories for non-stop fun. Built-in storage is an added bonus that parents will appreciate.
pros: Comes with a whopping 100 pieces, including a wooden train track, a three-car train, a double-decker bridge, wooden cars, road signs, and much more to create a stimulating and entertaining little town
Easy-to-clean surface features a colorful roadway, dock, and other landmarks for multi-dimensional play
Elegantly designed with a built-in trundle for storage
cons: Large size and difficult-to-follow instructions can make assembly tricky
Lots of raised pieces make it likely that enthusiastic kids will knock a couple over as they play

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Hit or miss. Kid does like playing with it. Not as much as we thought knowing how obsessed he is with trains. Still, it does occupy his time once in a while. The pieces could be sturdier. They fall apart too easily making it quite tedious to put back together. This is for a 4 year old and 4 year olds tend to be rough with their toys thus the sturdiness comment....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money nothing but issues.
customer_reviews.text: First start off with PC's came broken and scratched. Than cheap press board and will not hold up and don't over tighten the screws you will crack it. Directions don't show how to set up the track at all. Track doesnt even stay connected at all should have more supports. Complete trash. Which is a shame we have a lot of kid Kraft stuff and this is the worse.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Leibowitz

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble and my 3yr old twin boys love ...
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and my 3yr old twin boys love it. They spent hours playing with the trains on the first week, now they use the table for everything they play with. It can be converted into a coffee table as well, but my kids like the printed side better. The only issue we have is when a child is sitting close to the table, and the drawer is being opened/closed, the feet can get scratched by the sides or get stuck in the space underneath the drawer. My boys learned quickly to not keep their feet too close to or under the table. Other than that, its fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Anu V

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible but won't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: First I've ordered this train tablet with a high Hope's that it is a better quality then the other one that I recently tossed. It is a pretty good table but instructions weren't easy (if you aren't really good at assemble things) the table won't sit properly it kept popping back up. Had minor scratches and paints were smudged right side. I was thinking to returned it the night of,but then I didn't want my son to be disappointed so i just kept it. Would I purchase this product or recomend it to someone I know? I don't think so, unless they somehow fix this issue's.
customer_reviews.author: kim jong h

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: The table itself was easy to put together. Putting the track together took two of us as the instructions are not the greatest and there are A LOT of pieces! There are a couple places that come apart fairly easily if you knock the supports over. My grandson love love loves this toy! Worth every penny! The storage drawer underneath is not connected but rolls on wheels under it. It can come out of either side which is nice. It rolls easily on the carpet too.
customer_reviews.author: kshav6

customer_reviews.title: Good enough but could be better.  Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Outer box was pretty beat up by the delivery guy but the insides seemed to survive well enough. I had to go ahead and assemble it to check as Amazon didn't have any additional units to ship and I didn't want to take a chance on disappointed kids at Christmas. Overall it was about as expected. Typical fiber board construction with a few paint blemishes. The frame all just snaps together, which makes it difficult to pick up and move once assembled. We figure on using our furniture sliders for future movement. Otherwise, I think the kids will love it. It looks very engaging for them and decently built for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: aggiejosh

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy Great train table and toys
customer_reviews.text: Wow this Train table the hit of Christmas who bought this for a grandson and I was amazed how well this is built how easy it was to assemble it's very good quality my grandson loves it. It comes with all the Trap all the trains planes cars this is an amazing toy
customer_reviews.author: Pat Kay

customer_reviews.title: Overall its pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is phenomenal for the price. The "craftsmanship" leaves something to be desired. Not everything fits together the way it should and it requires a little reworking on your part to make it fit properly. That being said the storage area is great, the table overall is great. The flow of the track is great and really well designed. Pushing the trains in either direction takes you through the whole course. It is a pretty big table, not that this is a con in any way but there are some sections my four year old has to stretch to reach so if considering for a younger child it might be something to keep in mind. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Russo

customer_reviews.title: Great for looks..not so much for playing!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but the tracks don’t stay together very well. My twins can’t play with it without it all falling apart. The whole thing is suspended so you can’t put much pressure on it without it breaking. The double bridge is two narrow to push a car through. The board it sits on chips and scratches really easy. The whole set slides all over the place. It was easy enough to build but it doesn’t line up well so it’s a bit wobbly. It’s nice for looks but not really for playing. My kids get really frustrated with it not staying in place and constantly falling over so they end up walking away from it. Such a disappointment:(
customer_reviews.author: walton

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves this!
customer_reviews.text: If your kid has already destroyed everything else in your home and you’re looking for something else for them to tear apart and spread all over the house then this is the table for you! If you don’t already have 18,000miles Of wooden train tracks strewn across the house then you need to get you this table and get in the game! But the kids love it, so...
customer_reviews.author: Alex Seda

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Package arrived and box was damaged and had ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Package arrived and box was damaged and had holes in it. Just opened it to put together for my son for Christmas and got the whole base and drawer put together and started putting the top together only to find the 20 14 mm screws needed are missing and track piece #3 showing on the instructions are missing as well. Now I can't have this together for my son to open on Christmas morning. Extremely disappointed and frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift and play area for parties
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and sturdy enough it doesn't break when my 4 yo lays on it or jumps on it. Just wait too thrilled when my son was able to peel off the sticker design on the table with little effort, but still a good buy .
customer_reviews.author: Judee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected!
customer_reviews.text: The assembly is what you would expect with how much stuff you get... took me about an hour and a half. Our little guys is gonna a freak out on Christmas day! Note: the 1st one we ordered was damaged in shipping, so we had to order a replacement. That one was perfect. Check for damage before you throw away the box.
customer_reviews.author: K&N's mom 2013

customer_reviews.title: Thomas the Train sets fit on these tracks as well!!
customer_reviews.text: It comes with a decent amount of tracks and even cool wooden cars and a helicopter. These tracks also work for Thomas trains! Its a little heavy but was very easy to put together and is durable. The drawer underneath isn't attached and just sits on the ground so its pretty easy to move on capret.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: This product came in a bunch of thrown together pieces in the box. Most of the pieces are broken, cracked, or paint missing. The wood pieces are broken and unable to assemble together. We’re missing pieces to hold the tracks together, handles for the drawers, and plenty more. I will never buy another product off here. This wasn’t some cheap purchase. I spent quite a bit of money, and expected a quality purchase. This train table was for my sons Christmas, and it’s completely unusable. I would not recommend buying this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great train set and table The only problem was a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great train set and table The only problem was a piece of the track got broken while my son was playing with it. Little bit of supper glue and we were back in the railroad business! The table is pretty sturdy too my son will clime up on it while playing with his trains. The storage cart work great too. You can store lots of train tracks and other toy in it. However it is a cart on caster wheels not a draw attached to the table.
customer_reviews.author: Grease Monkey Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: I didn't understand the instructions clearly, however I found a YouTube video and followed it until I got the feel of it. The bridges screws didn't align well with the holes and I used a butter knife to screw them in. I recommend a light drill and to first assemble the bridges together before the tracks. Some tracks in the middle of the table are meant to be loose I suppose and didn't have a problem with them. Overall, this was a great buy, fundamental in learning and entertaining. This is a good product while quarantined due to today's pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: If you want a headache but this ,I won't say what frustrated we feel after expending almost 2 hours putting this together and after realize all tracks fall appart if you go to YouTube you will find you need to purchase other products to have the tracks together. Please don't waist your money.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Covered with fiberglass particles
customer_reviews.text: The pieces were all covered in fiberglass. If you don't mind your child being exposed to fiberglass, then no biggy. After hours of decontaminating, the table turned out to be pretty cool. Since I'm someone who frowns upon exposing children to fiberglass, I choose to rate this 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Altruist

customer_reviews.title: This brand has gone downhill
customer_reviews.text: I've always owned KidKraft but this table is not worth the money. Came with pieces used, broken, and not finished. The instructions are the worst, just look at a picture if you decide to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Danica Rushing

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table!
customer_reviews.text: The table is really as gorgeous as it looks in the picture. The huge storage drawer is perfect for storing extra tracks, trains, and cars. The only drawback (if you can call it that) is that the table comes with too many extras--too many cars, little people, and decorations. My 3 year old had a bit of sensory overload w all of the stuff, and it makes it a little more challenging to play w so much on the table. This is where that large storage drawer comes in handy! :-) Overall a really great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful train table and pieces
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t believe the sale price for this beautiful furniture train table. High quality. The pieces with magnets easy for a toddler to use. I found a great deal and this will last for many years and another generation,
customer_reviews.author: Jo R.

customer_reviews.title: Good value train set
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son around 18 months. We took off most of the pieces until he was older. He loves the table and the printing on the top is fun for him to push trains around. When we have the track up he can't reach some of the middle areas and gets frustrated. The wood the table is made with is cheaper so don't expect it to be all that sturdy -- especially the drawer. But having the drawer is very nice for putting away toys. The train tracks don't fit other trains such as similar Thomas trains which is very annoying. All in all it's a pretty decent value and my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: TP3

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but beware Amazon's support
customer_reviews.text: We were expecting some trials and tribulations based on previous reviews. We found it very easy to put together. This set comes with so many tracks and peripherals and our son loves it. I only have 4 stars because we were missing a piece for the track and Amazon told us we could u assemble and send back for a new set. That would have been crazy for one little plastic piece. Luckily the company that makes the product was great and sent out the replacement piece for free.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy P.

customer_reviews.title: Be aware
customer_reviews.text: It was damaged beyond use, was a Christmas gift and to much bulk to send back. Refunded 60.00 but I lost the entire gift as well as the money I paid. Trash man just took it. There was no replacements available. Nor parts. Had to happen in factory because box wasnt damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Vallera

customer_reviews.title: it is sturdy looks attractive to have in your home
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I can't believe they're are any negative reviews!! My husband put this together in under 30min, it is sturdy looks attractive to have in your home, comes with all necessary pieces so you don't spend a fortune having to buy the extra buildings, my son is 2 and ABSOUTELY LOVES THIS TABLE, since getting for Christmas he comes down every morning and that is the first thing he goes to! I HIGHLY recommend this table. The price and quality can't be beat!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Activity Table! Hands on Learning
customer_reviews.text: Great grandson loves it. Keeps him busy for hours using his imagination and creating his own little world! He actually touches all the parts, changes the roads, creates new little towns and ingages in 'battles' with his action figures super agents. Better than an iPad any day!
customer_reviews.author: D. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Real review from real person
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Too bad it doesn’t stay together and u gotta buy additional braces before it’s even functional. It’s nice to know after u have 3 hours into assembling it and it’s Xmas. What a joke
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The table part was very easy to put together, the drawer underneath took a little longer, but still easy. The train tracks fall a part, but I anticipated this and bought a box of brackets which work perfectly. Overall it looks a little cheaper than I expected, but still a good sturdy table with a cool track.
customer_reviews.author: kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Large, heavy piece (understandably... but just ...
customer_reviews.text: Large, heavy piece (understandably... but just made this even more frustrating!)...first piece out of the box had a huge scratch on it. My husband was angry.. I overlooked it. The next two pieces were both damaged. One had the hardware put on wrong!... the other piece had TWO out of three broken screws, so we couldn't even change out the screws. It was impossible to put the pieces together because of this. We then loaded up the huge box with all of the defective pieces for a full refund. There is no excuse for this kind of negligence on a piece that is so expensive! Unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: arianna thomson

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself the headache. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate this lower I would. We bought one for our child's birthday it came completely destroyed and we had to return it. Amazon then replaced it, the. Of was in better shape but when we opened it again it was busted. Not having a choice we repaired it so our child would have this for his birthday. If you buy this prepare for cheap bolts and pressboard. The cams stripped out on ours and the tracks don't fit together. I will never buy another kidkraft product again.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan W Lahue

customer_reviews.title: Overall we really like the train table
customer_reviews.text: Overall we really like the train table. I numbered the tracks for easier assembly in the future. Downfall is trains don;t easily run on tracks. Also I learned the hard way with my kids sippy cup leaking water, wrecks the table top surface very quickly. Overall cheaper in price than some of the more well known train sets but still fun.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Dykstra

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together and he plays with it every ...
customer_reviews.text: I agonized over which train set to get. There are so many out there. My three year old son absolutely LOVES this! It was easy to put together and he plays with it every day. It is also nice looking which is a bonus, as we have it in our family room so it's very accessible to him.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy E. Vick

customer_reviews.title: Very nice train set
customer_reviews.text: Love this train set! It is so nice and well made. My 3 yr old daughter was thrilled with this gift from Santa and thoroughly enjoys playing with it. The only downfall to this item are the assembly directions, they are terrible, and the tracks come apart easily, but overall I feel like it was a good purchase and it creates imagination for my daughter and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: pmcrn99

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment for the little ones on a snowy housebound day!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 1/2 year old grandson for Christmas and he loves it! Lives in Colorado and they put it into their game room in the basement for snowy winter days when they are indoors looking for something to do. the parts fit into a drawer underneath and helps keep it together. the 10 year old likes it too-
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Finally opened for Christmas...
customer_reviews.text: The train table is beautiful. Went together with no trouble. Color and finish look perfect for the room and the track design is so pretty. Two year-old grandson loves it...but has some frustration as expected. I advised leaving the complicated design for later and using a simple starter track, but he has played on other train tables so the entire set was constructed. He's two but he keeps going back to the train table. It is great!
customer_reviews.author: Carol M. Hutchens

customer_reviews.title: Many hours of playing.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 years old loved it. It is like a mint city for him spending almost all day long playing with it. No broken parts after the shipment and it was not hard to set up. The only thing I would change would be the stations, I would rather to have space inside of some of the stations to park the vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Dayana Castro

customer_reviews.title: Great table, no directions for setting up tracks
customer_reviews.text: They give u no directions to assemble the tracks! the table was easy to assemble, And has held up very well for months. I bought clear elastics to help the tracks stay together better. The picture doesnt have the full tracks set up.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Great Train Table!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 2 and 3.5 year old who absolutely LOVE this table. The drawer on the bottom is huge and holds a ton of toys. Unfortunately, one of the parts was incorrect so the track doesnt quite fit correctly, but it still works. The instructions for putting together the track, aren't that great, I recommend numbering the tracks or do what we did which was use wood glue to glue all the pieces together after about the 20th time putting it together. :)
customer_reviews.author: Carey A.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but could be sturdier
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this train table this year for my 3 and 5 year old boys. Keeps them busy for hours! But a couple pieces have already broken so just wish it was a little sturdier :(
customer_reviews.author: Jaklyn

customer_reviews.title: Metropolis train table and Track set a winner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Metropolis train set because the origin ball one he had, did not make it from Colorado to Florida. The president cel was great and so is the quality. Eventually it can be used a coffe table as it was made with real wood, not particle board d My 2 1/2 year old grandsons bus so very happy to have Thomas and his friends to play on his new, and improved train set. Idefinetely would recommend this to any train track aficionado!
customer_reviews.author: mark twain

customer_reviews.title: 3 years later
customer_reviews.text: and my son still loves to play with this train table! Despite how big it is, I don't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: F L D

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! Exactly as described. Excellent quality. Worth the money. Much cheaper than the store! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great train table
customer_reviews.text: Great train table! My kids use the draws underneath for other toys also. The downside is that the tracks keep falling down so easily. Everyone knows how ruff one boy can be try two playing together. Dad spends time putting it together and 5 minutes later it's on the floor. They spend most of there time with cars and trains on the table without using the tracks due to the frustration of it always falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Telly

customer_reviews.title: Buy This!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought this for our son for Christmas. He absolutely loves it! The instructions were spot-on and it made it very easy to put the Train table together. Don't be mistaken though! There are many parts and it did take some time to put together. But the finished product is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Maryssa

customer_reviews.title: Not a standard track
customer_reviews.text: The table is easy to put together. HOWEVER, the track is NOT a standard track. The curved pieces are too curved to allow standard trains to move around them without falling off. I know this is to make the layout work, but it should have a warning. My son is autistic, and he loves things that work. This doesn't. It would be AWESOME if it did. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RHorne

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected. Also, compatible with Hape trains.
customer_reviews.text: Much sturdier than expected. Was able to put the track together using the customer images (thanks all) but the cars and trains kept jumping track till I put the guard rail pieces in the corners next to the inclines.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Boyd

customer_reviews.title: The train set is nice and my boys love it
customer_reviews.text: The train set is nice and my boys love it, other than the fact that I'm going to have to glue it down because the youngest keeps destroying it. ...But as I was trying to assemble the drawer, we were giving the wrong parts. Instead of two no. 7 parts and one no. 8 part, we got three no. 8 parts. And I can't find a way to just get the replacement part because the only options it gives me is to get a refund and return my already put together set or get a new one and return my set. Both being a huge pain.
customer_reviews.author: william t green

customer_reviews.title: EASY ASSEMBLY
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO ASSEMBLE AND DISASSEMBLE FOR STORAGE OR RELOCATION. NOT A CHEAP LOOKING PIECE OF FURNITURE AND IT SEEMS TO BE ABLE TO TAKE THE ABUSE FROM A 3 AND 4 YEAR OLD
customer_reviews.author: I KICK

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Came with a couple broken train pieces and a broken crane. Would be cool otherwise but you need every piece to build the track. No extras.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: My two smaller kids love this train table ! It’s fabulous for entertaining for hours . It’s very durable
customer_reviews.author: Amber H.

customer_reviews.title: Shipped damaged.
customer_reviews.text: We were replacing a second hand table with one that had a set included. The plastic structure pieces, especially the bridge, are pretty cheap and the way it's fastened together makes moving it challenging. Some of the "wood" pieces had minor damage before shipping and was obviously touched up. One could tell they attempted but failed to repair their product prior to shipment. Furthermore, the home assembly process calls for fasteners a little too long for application which causes the veneer to pop out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon faithful

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Great table, terrible directions to build the city. My son absolutely loves it though. Its great that it has the construction zone, the helicopter pad, cars and boats. Thomas trains work just fine on the tracks as well!
customer_reviews.author: Dcarr

customer_reviews.title: BEST TRAIN TABLE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this over a year ago and my three-year-old plays with it EVERY day. It sits right in my living room and has held up well despite the abuse he gives it. Unlike some others, I thought it was easy to put together (for the layout, I used the images from Amazon). I do wish that there was a way to lock in the drawer as he runs into it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Best train table I've found
customer_reviews.text: Not difficult at all to put together, just take your time and don't rush. Great quality and very sturdy. My 2 year old is rough on it, with no problems. Pay close attention when assembling the train tracks to make sure the "lip" is in the right place (to hold the tracks in place). Great product, would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: JHCPhT

customer_reviews.title: Train Set for Grand Kids
customer_reviews.text: Overall this train set is great for my grand kids, they love it and can spend some time playing with it. It's also looks great and with the table and draw is very functional. Not easy to put together but overall assembly was't bad. Really looks good, plays well with the grand kids and actually looks good when we have guests. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: VinceNaples

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Great. We've had this in our livingroom for a long time now. All 4 of my kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: The table was very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: The table was very easy to put together. The tracks, however, were not. The instructions were very minimal and it took my husband and myself over an hour to get it together - and once it was almost all the way together we realized we put it together backwards so the last piece wouldn't work! At least it went faster the second time around!
customer_reviews.author: Kateri M.

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of the table
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the table. I followed everyone's advice and labeled the pieces for quicker construction, and I had no trouble. I wish the top pieces were sturdier and fit more smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Stay far away!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever created. None of the pieces stays together. Everything is slipping and sliding off the table. The trundle falls out. The railroad doesn't attach to the table which is slippery. It is useless because everything falls off the table the moment a child touches anything. Took too long to put together. Waste of time and money. I'd love the vendor to pack it up and take it back and return my money. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vika F

customer_reviews.title: This product came with horrible packaging. The corners on top board were came ...
customer_reviews.text: This product came with horrible packaging. The corners on top board were came in as damaged. The assembly instructions were really hard to follow specially the train track. you need to look at more than 2 pages to get the track assembled. Makority of the little parts were not tagged or numbered so it was difficult to know which part of the track goes where. For the price of the product, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money and provides plenty of storage space for all the pieces and then some!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: Never had an easier kids toy to put together!!! It went together so easily. The track is another story... instructions weren’t particularly clear on that but didn’t slow down on the fun
customer_reviews.author: bushnell10

customer_reviews.title: My son loves trains!  The table and set are great but the train set instructions not so much
customer_reviews.text: My six year old loves trains and we got him this table and train set. The table and drawer were easy to put together with clear instructions and all of the necessary parts. The train set is fun, but the instructions to put that thing together were horrible. I pulled up the picture and video from amazon and built it looking at them. They were great help! I would recommend this set, it is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful train set. Our kids love it. 4 stars because I wish the tracks could be secured to the wooden table top. They are not and the whole track structure slides all over the table . amd our toddlers pull apart the tracks as there is no way to secure them ( bought the track locks and they only work on a few pieces) but other then that we love this train set our kids play with it everyday . Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: KNy

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and 2 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little afraid to put together when I saw some of the reviews, but it was easier than I thought. Biggest time saver was labeling the train set pieces as I took them out of the box. My "wild" 2 year old son played with it all-day and not once did the tracks slide off the table or really even move noticeably. It's a great toy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ecarr

customer_reviews.title: This has been an excellent present for my 2 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: This has been an excellent present for my 2 year old daughter, she absolutely love's it. Pretty durable, although the boards were a bit warped when we took it out of the box to assemble, and a corner piece of wood popped off within a month.So the table itself is definitely cheaply made.But overall my daughter really likes it and play's with it everyday.:-)
customer_reviews.author: Lainy

customer_reviews.title: Broken and missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: Missing both sets of handles and the end panel was recieved split. Besides those issues the product seems nice but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Laxton

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler train enthusiasts
customer_reviews.text: This is a very stylish & versitile train table with lots of fun/kid appeal. A little confusing to put together at first but when finished it looks very nice & the kids love it. a few issues w/needing to reconnect parts of the train track, but Im used to that kinda thing w/practically all my children's toys. Love that it goes well w/my normal home furnishings (to appeal to the decor conciencious) and love the huge storage drawer to hide away the parts when not in use. also makes a nice general play top surface when surface panels flipped over to look more like a coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: allthatglitterz79

customer_reviews.title: Nice train table set for 3 yr old.
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty durable but price probably could be lower but for the free shipping it was fair. The tracks didn’t come with instructions to assemble but you can go back online and see them in color.
customer_reviews.author: Rhinosteel

customer_reviews.title: Choo-Choo
customer_reviews.text: The table was easy to put together. The track was a little more complicated as it didn't have the best instructions. We bought the Suretrack clips to help keep the track together; it stays together pretty good. My 2yo loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Great! Avery nice investment.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson last Christmas and I can not tell you the countless hours that he has played with this. Well worth the investment and no problems. My son put it together and I love that it has storage and even came with some trains beyond all the ones I have given him. It is also a beautiful piece of furniture that blends in very well in the playroom. Everyone has participated in play time and it is a joy.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: My boys love it!
customer_reviews.text: My boys love it. Assembly isn't bad...have a screwdriver handy. Could be some improvements to keep track together better. Overall pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Our son loved this for his 2nd birthday
customer_reviews.text: Our son loved this for his 2nd birthday! He literally plays with it everyday! Great piece for the living room since it’s nice looking and can easily blend in. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: B&E Worthington

customer_reviews.title: Beware of split wood.
customer_reviews.text: Many pieces of wood were split. It was a Christmas gift so we didn’t try to return it. Grandchild loves it. We decided to glue track together. It is a nice set but disappointed in the status of those many split pieces of wood.
customer_reviews.author: Zabbco

customer_reviews.title: and I love it because the drawer underneath holds all the pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this table to play trains on, and I love it because the drawer underneath holds all the pieces and the color matches our decor and doesn't stand out like most large children's toys do.
customer_reviews.author: Megan F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a playroom
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old grandson was thrilled with his birthday gift of this table. It was VERY easy to put together and is of good quality.....the storage drawer will come in handy. You need a designated playroom or large bedroom or basement for this item as it is quite large.
customer_reviews.author: sharon beaubien

customer_reviews.title: Loved It!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical after some bad reviews,but I loved It.It was super easy to put together and all the pieces where complete.My son plays for hours on this table on his own.The only regret I have is not buying It sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Frutos

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking table and kids like it
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice table and my 3 year old loves it. The table is easy to build but the pieces are a pain to put together and then they move and fall all the time. Also, the wooden pieces won’t fit perfectly making the train fall down the tracks all the time. i
customer_reviews.author: Andres Zarate de Landa

customer_reviews.title: What a bargain! Buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: Where great table, easy to assemble and so many high quality toys with it. You don't need anything else. My 2 yr old loves it all.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Walsk

customer_reviews.title: ... son was asleep so he could have one big cool present for christmas well looks like thats not going ...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to put it together while my two year old son was asleep so he could have one big cool present for christmas well looks like thats not going to happen now thanks to it being busted up inside shipping box
customer_reviews.author: russ taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great table, save the trainset for older children.
customer_reviews.text: Great table! We got it for our toddler son and he absolutely loved it. I would say the train set is great but not ideal for little ones as it doesn't stay in place long (lol). I would certainly recommend this as an activity table with storage!
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Train Table & Train Set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this train and table set for my grandson. Was very pleased with the quality and size of the table. Came with everything shown in the picture, which was very nice for an all in one gift. Definetely takes some time putting this set together. Would highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Woods

customer_reviews.title: Train does not roll on tracks
customer_reviews.text: The wood is not cut right and the train does not roll
customer_reviews.author: Tushar Patel

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this train set
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this train set! The peices are fun and well made. The track is solid. It's kind of a pain to put together, but the table itself is very solid and should last us a long time. My 6 year old daughter LOVES this table and my 1yr old son loves to "play" with it as well. Definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: great train table, as described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in good condition. 2 year old loves it. Didn't set up train track yet as the table itself is entertaining, will slowly build it up over time to maintain his interest in it. Don't plan on securing the track to the table so we can change it as we want to.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old LOVES this set! We glued the track together because it was coming apart a lot, probably because he’s just rough though!
customer_reviews.author: VICKi L’Abbe

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Top play area didn’t match up with the table itself
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: I'm so angry as we paid good money for this and it didn't even last a ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 3 yr old for his birthday, and surprisingly he isn't a rough boy! That was October 2016 and today (Feb 22, 17) this happened! I'm so angry as we paid good money for this and it didn't even last a year!! I will be emailing the company as this is ridiculous! It has nails poking out and that obviously is dangerous!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K.

customer_reviews.title: Another One Star
customer_reviews.text: I'll just default to the other one star review. We assembled this on Christmas Eve and I was very displeased with the build quality. There were multiple pieces missing and there were broken components inside. Once assembled (and rigged due to missing parts) the entire set is very flimsy and the tracks barely hold together.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard A. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Took too long to put together and took my two year old five minutes to destroy it 🤦🏼‍♀️. Pieces everywhere. So sick of putting it together. Also a few pieces to the actual table were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Rochester

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Real wood with tons of accessories for my grandson to play for many hours. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Belliveau

customer_reviews.title: Very simple !
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Recommend hot gluing the track down to avoid putting it together a million times. I love that the drawer is on wheels and not An actual drawer. Makes it easier for my son to access it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Logsdon

customer_reviews.title: This table is awesome! It's very roomy
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome! It's very roomy, lots of space in the storage drawer, which is always wonderful! This table is beautiful, sturdy, and could easily be used as a coffee table when not being used as a train table.. We are 100% pleased with our purchase and would absoluty buy from again!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Newcombe

customer_reviews.title: mixed reviews
customer_reviews.text: GREAT concept but Not the greatest quality. Got this table for my son for Christmas. My son LOVES this table coupled with his commercial friends from the that well known train collection so he plays for hours and as he goes around the table playing I see increasing visual wear already.
customer_reviews.author: KJPII's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Was initially excited about this but it's more of a pain than it's worth. Walked into one corner and it just fell off. The pieces don't stay together very well and it's a pain to glue down since you can't glue all the pieces without losing the ability to turn it over.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: fun but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This table has some really nice features- cave/tunnel, double bridge, boats, trees, large drawer for storage, etc. But the construction is not as good as i thought it would be. Overall we are happy with it. I just hope it lasts the test of time...
customer_reviews.author: Shoppersmith

customer_reviews.title: Great table.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this table for my 2 yr old grandson. His dads and grandfather put it together with no problems (using better tools than what it comes with). He Loved it and played with it that whole day. All of us love the storage on wheels that sits under the table.
customer_reviews.author: noro

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is great & exactly what we've come to expect from KidKraft. My 1.5 yr old loves trains & cars, so this was the perfect Santa Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: AGT Pasadena

customer_reviews.title: Grandsons had a ball unwrapping for Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this set together and then I wrapped it so the grandsons ages 6 and 3 could unwrap it. They loved it and played with it all afternoon. I am sure they will have many enjoyable hours playing with this train table set.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis's Girl

product_meta.title: KidKraft Metropolis Train Table & Set
product_meta.description:
Imaginations will soar as kids explore the KidKraft Metropolis Train Table Set. This urban scene comes with 100 colorful pieces, including the magnetic three-car train that glides above the town on the elevated track. A double-decker suspension bridge and tall mountain give even greater height to this towering railroad. Each piece is crafted for fun and for safety, and the whole set packs neatly away in the jumbo storage drawer.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Our Metropolis Table and Train Set lets kids take control of an entire city!
feature_bullets: Big enough for kids to play together
Packaged with detailed, step-by-step assembly instructions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars575 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
